description: A martial arts tournament is hosted to determine the world's strongest waitress.
keywords: martial arts,martial arts action,waitress,large breasts,big breasts
name: Variable Geo

review.name: An instant cult anime flick
review.reviewBody:
Out of all the animes that came out in the U.S. in the year 1999, this is one of the most bizarre, yet enjoyable anime mini-series. Based on the popular Japanese all female fighting game series, Variable Geo (or V.G. for short) is a popular national sport in a semi-futuristic Japan. The rules are simple: if the fighter loses, they have to strip and embarrass themseleves in front of a viewing public. But it's run by a corrupt corperation with an alterior motive, which I don't wish to spoil.

Overall, it's a good mix of all kinds of genres in addition to stylish animation and character designs.

10/10
